SEARCH
Package HMS.src.user

Class Pharmacist

java.lang.Object
HMS.src.user.User
HMS.src.user.Pharmacist
public class Pharmacist extends User
Represents a Pharmacist in the Hospital Management System. Extends the User class and includes pharmacist-specific functionalities such as managing prescriptions, viewing appointment outcomes, and managing medications.

  • Constructor Details

    • Pharmacist

      public Pharmacist(String userID, String name, String emailId, int age, Gender gender)
      Constructs a new Pharmacist object with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      userID - The unique identifier for the pharmacist.
      name - The name of the pharmacist.
      emailId - The email ID of the pharmacist.
      age - The age of the pharmacist.
      gender - The gender of the pharmacist.

  • Method Details

    • dispenseMedication

      public void dispenseMedication(Prescription prescription)
      Dispenses medication for a given prescription.
      Parameters:
      prescription - The Prescription to be dispensed.

    • viewApptOutcomeRecord

      public void viewApptOutcomeRecord()
      Views the appointment outcome record. Delegates the operation to AppointmentManager.

    • viewMedicationInventory

      public void viewMedicationInventory()
      Views the medication inventory. Delegates the operation to MedicationManager.

    • updatePrescriptionStatus

      public void updatePrescriptionStatus()
      Updates the status of a prescription. Delegates the operation to PrescriptionManager.

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword()
      Allows the pharmacist to change their password. Delegates the operation to PasswordManager.
